front.title: T/TCP -- TCP Extensions for Transactions Functional Specification

author.organization: University of Southern California, Information Sciences Institute

abstract.t: This memo specifies T/TCP, an experimental TCP extension for efficient transaction-oriented (request/response) service. This backwards-compatible extension could fill the gap between the current connection-oriented TCP and the datagram-based UDP.
This work was supported in part by the National Science Foundation under Grant Number NCR-8922231.
